turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I did order Starbucks drink.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let's do it. what starbucks should i order at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one in Boston on Soldiers Field Road.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: grande moca latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want that iced or hot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hot, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what kind of milk do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 2% with no whip cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that's going to be it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, the total for your hot grande mocha latte with 2% milk and no whipped cream from starbucks in boston.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: comes out to $4.50.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Excellent.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i've submitted your order, the drink will b ready in 15 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, take care.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.
